product.title: ZenCart 2Pcs Hair Straightener Comb Attachment Flat Iron Straightening Comb Accessories Professional Home Women Girls Hair Brush Styling Tool
product.description:
High Temperature Resistant Material: Withstands up to 500° without softening or melting, ensuring durability and integrity during use.
Damage-Free Styling: Flat iron blades provide smooth, stress-free hair straightening, reducing heat damage for naturally healthy-looking hair.
Super Time Saver: Comb attachment allows for quick and efficient one-handed styling, eliminating the need to juggle multiple tools.
Portable Split Design: Detachable feature fits various straightener sizes, making it convenient for travel and storage without taking up much space.
Ideal Gift Choice: Practical and innovative gift for achieving dream straight hair, perfect for birthdays, holidays, or special occasions to show care and thoughtfulness.

Description:
Introducing our innovative hair comb Attachment for flat irons, designed to revolutionize your hair styling routine! Made from high temperature resistant material capable of withstanding up to 500°, this comb attachment ensures no heat damage or material deterioration during use. 
The flat iron blades provide smooth, straight hair without the stress, reducing heat damage for a naturally luscious look. Say goodbye to juggling a straightener and comb - our comb attachment allows for quick and efficient styling with just one hand, saving you time and hassle. 
The portable split design is perfect for travel, easily fitting various straightener sizes and making on-the-go styling a breeze. This comb attachment is not only a time-saver but also an ideal gift choice for anyone looking to achieve their dream straight hair effortlessly. 
Perfect for birthdays, holidays, or special occasions, show your care and thoughtfulness with this practical and innovative hair styling tool.

Item Name: Hair Comb
Material: Plastic
Features: Replacement Accessories, Easy to Install, Universal 
Size Details:
L: 9.3cm/3.66", W: 3cm/1.18", H: 3.4cm/1.34" (Approx.)

Notes:
Due to the light and screen setting difference, the item's color may be slightly different from the pictures.
Please allow slight dimension difference due to different manual measurement.

Package Includes:
2 x Hair Combs
